# Copilot Instructions

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

This is a Twitter clone project built with Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma, and Tailwind CSS. The project aims to replicate Twitter/X functionality including:

- User authentication and profiles
- Tweet creation, editing, and deletion
- Like, retweet, and reply functionality
- Follow/unfollow system
- Real-time updates
- Responsive design
- Media upload support

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14 with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Database**: Prisma ORM with SQLite (development) / PostgreSQL (production)
- **Authentication**: NextAuth.js
- **State Management**: React Context/Zustand
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Icons**: Lucide React (free)
- **Forms**: React Hook Form with Zod validation

## Code Standards
- Use TypeScript for all components and utilities
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Implement responsive design (mobile-first)
- Use server components when possible
- Follow Twitter/X design patterns and UX
- Use free, open-source libraries only
